Description: Painted wooden model group: three figures making bricks.
Curator's comments: Published: From Beni Hasan tomb 275: J Garstang, The Burial Customs of Ancient Egypt (London 1907), 131; A. M. J. Tooley. Egyptian Models and Scenes (1995). Shire Egyptology. p. 45, fig. 43. The photo in Garstang shows that the figure which now holds the brick-mould differs from that originally located in that position.
Acquisition name: Donated by: Victoria and Albert Museum (Trustees of)
